channel.title: Question: How do you change prices in shops?
channel.description: just got a new rare shop and dont no how to change the prices says its like 1 gp for phat how do i change the price?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 10:47:58 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 11:27:05 PM[/size][hr]please soemone help

item.title: Question: How do you change prices in shops?
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

Yes, I know it’s an old topic.

Go into item.cfg.
You’ll see something that looks like this.

item = 2677	Attack_cape	Its a Attack_cape	99000	99000	99000	0	0	0	0	0	9	9	9	9	9	0	0

The second number is the price in shops, you can change it to whatever you want it to be.

This also shows the bonuses. The second to last number is str bonus. Change that to w\e you want too. I made an uber pwnage owner weapon with this, lol spoon ftw.

item = 7433	Pwnz0rz_Spoon	Spoooooon!	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000	100000000

Anyone, use it if you want, worth 1b in all shops and has 1b to all bonuses…lol uber pwnage.
str is 10b lol pwnz0rz

Read full topic
item.source: Question: How do you change prices in shops?
